title: Billie on Halleyâ€™s Comet (Spotify Commentary)
lyrics:
[Spoken Word]
"Halley's Comet". Y'know... "Halley's Comet" 's just about falling in love and feeling of, a feeling of... euphoria and... life kind of feeling like you're floating and... y'know. Love is a crazy crazy thing and, "Halley's Comet" 's just like a sweet little romantic song.
